content.detailedDescription: I was lying on the beach with my girlfriend looking at the starry sky above the long island sound.  i saw a bright object moving very slowly, assumed it was a satellite, and debated even mentioning it.  i finally decided to point it out, and as soon as i did we both saw it start to move very unnaturally.  it changed direction and changed colors.  it looked as if it were swimming rather than flying.  it was jellyfish-like in the way it was almost always moving very slowly then would shoot in one direction quickly and kind of drift in that direction.  at one point i observed a commercial airplane fly near it and underneath it, and at that point the object became still and gave out a white starlight.  i watched it for about 45 minutes on the beach.  i finally went home and stood in my front yard and immedietly found it.  i called my mom and brother outside who both looked with toy binoculars and observed it was infact moving.  they observed the colors as well, but i let them know that it was not making any bursts of speed like i saw over the sound.  it appeared more west at this point, no longer over the sound but over the island.  i videotaped some of it, although i couldn't zoom in enough.  the object does infact move on tape, but the video does it no justice.  if anyone in the long island - conneticut area witnessed this, i'd like them to contact me immediately.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Ambiguous in shape - different colors of light.  it's movement was jellyfish like, with short bursts in random directions

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were doing some nite fishing on a pond near in sturbridge mass.The nite sky was very clear, i noticed some strange lights over the mt range, it was about 12am and the fish were not biting so i was relaxing and watching the sky.The moon was low in the sky and didn't give us much light. all of a sudden this pond which was 2 miles across turned as bright as day. we looked up and there was a huge  over us,maybe 2-300ft above us and made no noise at all.This disk coverd the space from the waters to the road where the car was,this would have made the spear at least 500 feet across my friend got very nervous along with me and we decided to get the to shore ,put the canoe on the car and leave. the light stayed with us all the way to the boat ramp. as we were putting the canoe on the car the light came closer. we were scared by now and just wanted to get out of there. we thru the gear and the canoe on the top of the car and tied it down with only one rope. the trip to the highway takes about 1 half hour and the next thing i recall is us parked on the side of the highway with all the poles and gear neatly stowed neatly in the back of the car. it took two and half hours to get where we stopped, it usually took 1 half hour to get this far. we arrived home about three and a half hours late. no reccolection where all this time went. also the canoe was tied down the way it should and not the way we thru it on the car. my friend would never talk about what happened and his wife told me he later had a nervous brakedown because of what happened that nite he never told her what happened and asked that i didn't either.
content.summary: Quiet nite fishing  when  this huge disk showed up instantly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of the harvest moon from my front porch, i took many by the way, and none of them at the angel this one was taken. when i viewed them on the computer that is when i saw it.
look for yourself and you tell me what i caught?
the object was in my view finder but was not visable to my eyes.
content.summary: Red in color, and round, no noise

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, my brother, my sister-in-law and i were vacationing at a coastal house in bodega bay, ca (about two hours north of san francisco).  we were watching the sun set over the ocean and preparing to watch the clear night sky, so we had big binoculars (16x70) set up on a tripod on the west-facing patio.  moments after sunset (which occurred at 7:15 p.M., [see photo ���100_1605[1]sunset���], while the sky at the horizon was still orangey, we noticed a very bright orange/gold streak moving at a slightly upward angle in a north-to-south direction [see photos ���100_1607[2]picture 3 unenhanced��� and ���picture 3 enhanced for brightness and contrast (3)���].  at arm���s length and measuring between thumb and forefinger, the streak early on was about an inch above the horizon.  we then looked at it through the binoculars and we saw not only the streak, but a dark, somewhat elongated object that was rounded at the leading edge of what we then called a ���trail���. over the next minute or two, the trail got to be about four inches long (as measured above) and the object took up a good ��� to ��� inch of that measurement.  we continued to see the trail but not the object with the naked eye.  

a minute or two after we first saw the trail, the object/trail appeared to stop and hover in place for another 10 minutes or so, but the trail did not dissipate at all like a vapor trail would.  (since we were facing west, it's also possible the object was not hovering but rather moving west to east or east to west after it appeared to stop.) we could see the trail and the "unmoving" object for a total of 10 minutes or so until it got too dark to see through the binoculars.  the pictures we took do not even begin to show the brightness of the trail.  

based on the "distance to horizon" calculator on the internet, we estimated the distance to the object was about 15.5 nautical or 17.9 statute miles.  (we did a google earth calculation that showed our rental house was 172 feet above sea level and, adding the five-foot height of the tripod, resulted in a "height of eye" of 177 feet.)  if the object was almost 18 miles away, the object would have to be quite large to appear as big as it did, even though it required binoculars to see it.

our collective conclusion was that the object was too big to be any kind of airplane and that the trail was not a vapor trail.  the way the object appeared to stop and hover, and the fact that the trail did not dissipate, were also very strange.  maybe it was some kind of missile, but we sure can���t figure it out.  none of us had ever seen such a thing.
content.summary: "hovering" ufo with trail at coastal bodega bay, ca , 2 hours north of san francisco

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought mabe it was just a bright star, but then it moved. and it was beautiful i couldnt stop starring at it. i watched for about 2 hrs as it flashed all kinds of colors.
content.summary: Flashed all kinds of colors and it was very bright,

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside on my balcony smoking a cig, i usually count all of the airplanes that are in the air every time i am out there. today, i looked west from my apartment which is nestled in the hills so i have a good view all the way to the hills in the peninsula. today i noticed a bright orange/red light that was sitting still. airplanes always move, they do not sit in one place for a long time, this one did not move at all. so i paid it little attention, and then looked back at it after counting all of the other airplanes. it still had not moved. now i am paying more attention to it, i see that another orange/red light has appeared near it. they sat in the sky for about 5 minutes before one of the lights moved south while the main one sat still in the same position. right now as i checked outside the largest of the lights has disappeared. as it is twilight, most of the airplanes in the area get a orange red glow when they turn. but it does not take an airplane 10-15 minutes to turn.
content.summary: Wierd lights viewed on the peninsula side of the bay area.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighted an orange rectangle (beam? bow-tie) shaped object.  rotating clockwise at 40-50 rpm or about 1 time per second.  traveling west to east.  in 5 seconds it traveled about the same distance a commercial airliner would travel in 10-15 seconds.  not as fast as a fly-over of the iss but somewhere in between.  orange beam had no additional lights and i could not ascertain structure (whether disk shaped or just an actual rectangle).

after 5-seconds of straight line flight (while rotating) - it stopped for under one second and then proceeded to "dodge" or reverse direction nearly 180* while changing from a rectangle to more of a single point of orange light.  it moved "upward" and to the west for under 1 second then back to the east again for under 1 second and again one or two more times.  at this point, i was thinking "i believe this is out of the orindary".  i then saw an approaching commercial airliner traveling west-bound from the east, presumably from phl.  it still had its take-off light on (bright light you see upon takeoff and landing).  i would say that the best way to describe the object's actions was that it was nearly on a direct course toward that airliner and then proceeded to stop and get out of the way and disappear upwards and away.
content.summary: Orange rotating rectangle stopped, changed course

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog. i have a habit of watching local aircraft traffic in the area as they approach the hillsboro and portland airport. i heard what sounded like a high performance aircraft and looked skyward and spotted a jet headed west at a very high altitude. it was barely visible. then a shiny brilliant spot caught my eye about 15 degrees north of the aircraft. i thought it was another aircraft until i watched it for a few seconds. it was moving very fast and making abrupt almost erratic changes in direction. it took only a matter of seconds before it was totally out of sight. from where i was standing it flew in a west / north west direction. if i had to guess i'd say it was 30000 feet or higher because it appeared to be higher than a vapor trail from another aircraft.
content.summary: High altitude shiny sphere moving very fast and erratic headed north west

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday september 22, 07

i noticed a bright lights to the south about 10 o���clock on the southern horizon just to the west of costilla new mexico at 7:20 pm it was between jupiter and the moon just below
the ecliptic line about two thumb lengths, with a compass it was 160 degree mark. the light at arms length was the size of a pin head. it was brighter then venus and you could see two lights together with the naked eye. the light was stationary and did not move for twenty minutes.

  when i observed the lights with my 10-50 binoculars it was reflecting light form the sun and was a golden diamond shape translucent with three lights internally you could see structure three parts the right and left were beveled outwards into the middle and the bottom was beveled to the middle making a straight line below the other two compartments. as the sun set the object glowed white with three separately lit compartments it would glow brighter and then weaken several times. the diamond shape was more defined as it grew darker. the object disappeared around 7:43 and the clouds moved in.

 witness # 2 costilla nm 
,

on saturday evening 9/22/07 at 7pm. my girlfriend and
i were on our way to her moms b-day party and she
noticed a bright light in the southern sky, just south
of the rising moon to the east. i told her to pull
over cause it just wasn't moving at all or blinking,
and it was too bright and large to be a star.
specially do to the fact that it was still day light
out, and she preceded to take three pictures of it. it
was an easy shot for the camera do to the exposure
light available.

we went on to the party and once we arrived we just
kept watching this still light, but this time with her
mom and her step dad, brother, brother girl friend,
and last to arrive was my friend and his two boys from
san diego ca. he the fire chief there for 12 fire
districts in the down town area of the city. he's
about as creditable as most, and by time time he
arrived we had found the binoculars and now were
looking at the details of the ufo. 

my self a professional artist, got a sketch pad and
started drawing the shape of this thing, kind of
smooched diamond -top to bottom, the bottom half being
more of a warmer golden light, shimmering sparkles at
those bottom edges(see illustration)the top half was
clearly two large bright white lights side by side
like eyes, almond shape to be exact.

after about 40 mins. of watching it clearly, some
clouds moved in and the object slowly disappeared.
also it was my opinion that the object become even more
transparent as before the later it got, as though the
sun had some effect with it. i could increasingly see
more sky through it
content.summary: Diamond shape translucent with three lights internally you could see structure three parts the right and left were beveled outwards into the middle and the bottom was beveled to the middle making a straight line below the other two compartments.

content.detailedDescription: I'm raising two children by myself. teaching them to hunt is critical native american life style and fullfils dietary consistency. from some point in sept. we began noticing beacon style, non-moving(for at least an hour)lights that dont rotate with the rest of the sky. we use these markers much, but as of late the sky has been temporarily  bench marked in the north, east, and south. even, switching off as their departure. being an army veteran of service during two wars, i have been many places, and am not really gullible. trained, i now snap into an almost robot like state(photographic)under pressure. i funtion supremely under the threat of death, harm to america or any of her children, or detriment to our great consitution, foreign or domestic. i would like more time for this report, but dinner overrides your enlightenment. please call or visit. i'm sure my entire mil.Svc will interest you greatly as well.     your friend joe.
content.summary: Early hunting season allows late evening sky observations. small sky beacons, call clouds to minnesota

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on my balcony with my buddy glenn. i just happened to look up and notice some strange moving lights just above the tree tops at some distance away. at first we thought it was a helicopter because they fly alot on our base. the object remained far away for a few minutes just kind of moving up and down. then it flew closer and we could see lights that appeared to revolve or shift around the object. that's when we noticed it wasn't a helicopter. my initial reaction was sheer terror. we ran downstairs and i grabbed my phone and ran back outside with glenn behind me. by then the object was very close. it was sort of hovering over the house across the street. once we made it to the driveway it seemed to dissapear.
content.summary: One light on each corner flashing intermittently.

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 5:30 am i went outside to look at the new bright star or planet that has been in our eastern sky for a couple of weeks now .Down about 1 inch and to the left of the star a bright flash appeared in the sky .It lasted about 2 seconds and looked as if it left a trail going right towards the bright star or planet.The sky did not light up but it was brilliant. did anyone else see this . thanks dean burgess
content.summary: Flash then left a trail

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke unusually early, approx. 5:00 am (i usually wake up around 9am since i work late at night i sleep long). i had a strange urge to step outside on the porch. after fighting the urge, i still went outside. i lit a cigaret. it was dark outside. then i looked up in the sky. i couldn't believe what i saw. there was an absolutely disproportionately humangous "star" in the blackness of the sky. at first i thought it was an airoplane flying low. but it had no landing lights flashing. then i realized it wasn't moving. i also heard no noise. it was just hovering stationary and silent. i thought to myself, i must be dreaming. 

then i tried to discern a shape. but the thing was so imensely bright that i could not see into its center, so as to find a shape. it was an abnormally intense bright white, visibly radiating rays of extreme bright light outward. activity-wise it was almost as if it was "very twinkling", but when i looked at the other stars for comparison, it out-twinkled them all. there was an energy movement about it, radiating this brightness outward. and for a moment i could feel a neuronic response in my fingertips, shooting down to my toes, as if a lot of sharp needles had penetrated me all at once. 

at this, i went to stay close to my door, ready to run back inside, as i became afraid. there i stood, trying to draw reference points in the landscape, in order to remember the position of this "star". 

i noticed clouds in the wind, as they moved in the sky, and as they passed, they momentarily blocked out the regular stars, yet the big "star" was not at all affected by it, as it would not disappear "behind" the clouds, like the rest of the stars. instead, the clouds passed behind it and its light outshone the clouds.

then i tried to discern a reference size between the normal stars and this one in question. the normal ones were so tiny in comparison, like the point of a pencil-tip, compared to a 25 cent american quarter. _go figure...

i called my daughet to see what i was seeing. (to make sure i wasn't dreaming".)

i had an uneasy feeling the whole time. -as if any moment it would drop low and come toward me. for this reason i went inside the house. i wanted to report this to authorities but then stopped short at the thought of having to wrestle with their disbelief and ridicule. -forget it!

ps.: i observed two helicopters, flying toward the direction of the "star", minutes apart one from the other. there was also an airplane, small, like a private plane, flying toward small executive airport in orlando -away from star, as if for landing). i do not recall the color of the choppers.)
content.summary: Huge "star" motionless, extreme brightness and size

content.detailedDescription:
Very early last sunday morning in fort erie, ontario across the river from buffalo ny(sept 23/07 ~1:00 am or so). i was outside around a fire with my niece and nephew. the sky was clear, weather nice. i looked to the sky and seen a triangular shaped ufo/aircraft at about 2500-3000 feet up flying low speed. it's belly was lit up with approx 7 white lights (in a v shape) and it was virtually silent (it was very silent). it's direction was north i believe, following the niagara river towards niagara falls (30 km away). our sighting was with 3 people and i would say it was 2-3 minutes duration as it disappeared into the night and tree line. this is the 3rd time in 1 month i have seen it. i visit my friend regularily who lives in ft erie, he has seen it with me a few weeks back. it was an awsome sight to see and next time i will have my camera on hand to video it. it is as if i can set my watch to this 'thing'. i also know it can be seen from buffalo, but do believe it was in canadian airspace the three times i seen it.

my take on this mystery aircraft/ufo is this. i believe it to be a b2 spirit bomber patroling the border, i may be wrong though. i am a true believer in ufo's and an aircraft buff, but to the untrained eye... this is one very freaky sight and confuse/scare someone by it's appearance. it is ghostly in nature and it blends into the night sky perfectly. added all that with it's silence and i am sure it is a b2 stealth. anyone reading this who is in either buffalo ny or fort erie ontario areas, i urge to set out with your video camera at about 10 at night to be sure you catch it. the wait is worth your time. i only assume this aircraft is flying easterly over lake erie then onto lake ontario. our area here is big time internation border with numerous bridges crossing into the usa and i am certain it is a secret border patrol tool. very intimidating!!!

comments and questions can be sent to bertgjohnson@gmail.Com 

thanks! b johnson

ps: please contact me with other area sightings. i have not seen it from niagara falls btw.
content.summary: Triangle ufo, low height, low speed with white lights on the belly

content.detailedDescription:
I live in east haven ct the water. over the last week on two separate occasions i have seen between two and three strange lights in the southwest sky around 9:15 in the evening while i am on my deck. they look like planets and they stay stationary for around 30 to 40 minutes. the first time i noticed the lights they were changing colors from white to blue to red. on the last occassion it was solid white color. 
both times after watching them for twenty minutes i would go inside and periodically check on them. eventually forty minutes later they would be gone.
content.summary: Strange stationary lights in the southwest sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching an episode of the u.F.O.Files on sky t.V. relating to u.S.O.S, at the interview relating to the 1967 shag harbour incident some 38 years later while the guy is being interviewed at the exact spot he claims he saw the u.S.O. in 1967 an object comes up out of the water behind him at great speed at 45 degrees, looking at him it appears from the left moving right it is far too fast to be man made.
initially i thought it was a camera fault but it is an object flying it is cigar shaped and was so fast it is gone in the blink of an eye.I recorded the object and my wife seen it as the same i am fascinated that it was caught on camera by the programme makers of the u.F.O. files the object moves so fast  it is gone in a flash was it put in by the makers i do not know but it has to be seen to be believed
content.summary: Cigar shaped object coming out of water at great speed

content.detailedDescription:
I just finished watching a baseball game on television on saturday 9/22/07 (go cubs!). immediately after the post game show, i went out to my deck, which is on the west side of my house, in my backyard. i was sitting in a chair facing east (towards my house) when i saw a jet traveling north from the south. there was nothing else to look at so i was following the jet with my eyes when an object caught my eyes when i was looking directly east. this object was all white and was completely standing still when i first saw it. at first, i thought it was a star or mercury/venus, but it was too early in the day to be able to see a star or planet. i kept my eyes on it and suddenly, it shot off from the ne to the sw. there was a very slight breeze from the ssw at the time, so i do not believe this was something carried by the wind, as it would have been going against the wind at a pretty good speed. as the object moved to the sw i was able to get a closer look at it. it was a very odd shape. almost like a balloon with a huge streamer, but the streamer did not flutter around as you would expect from a balloon being carried by the wind.

from the time the first object i saw began moving to the time it was out of sight was about 10 seconds. i did not get a chance to take a picture of that object. i was actually thinking about going inside and grabbing my camera when i notice a second object. this object was already moving when i noticed it. trying to think quick, i ran inside and grabbed my camera, turning it on when i was running back through the house to the deck (this took about 30 seconds as i had to go to the lower level of my house). when i got back outside, the object was just disappearing behind some trees and i could not get a picture. but, i immediately looked up to where the other objects appeared from and there was another object. i tried taking several pictures and am attaching the one of the best quality (object is in lower left corner). i can not tell what it is, even after zooming in on it. the sky was very bright and it is very difficult to zoom in on a small object very far away with those tiny view finders.

i do know that whatever these thing were had to be moving with their own power and not carried by the wind. as i said, there was a very slight breeze from the ssw and these things were moving to the sw from ne.
content.summary: Objects popping up out of nowhere traveling ne to sw

content.detailedDescription: This cigar shaped object was at about 4 inches from my eyes appeared to be so large i could smell this weird stench and my eyes were tearing from what i thought was smoke going in my eyes it smelled like a strawberry philly i felt a physic connection with this ufo i thought this is bullshit and it made me feel happy and very hungry almost as if i had the munchies i pulled out some potato chips during the event and ate them all they didnt fill me up so i strapped my rocketpack on and shot off to the neerest wawa to retrieve a chilly cheese dog and a bag of combos before i realized i forgot all about the ufo so i flew home to call my friend tom what a night
content.summary: I was flying home on my rocket pack when i was just over my house on park ave landing on my balcony i noticed out of the corner of my eye a cigar shaped object i could only see half of the object it appeared to be burning from the tip lit like a cherry

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took several pictures of a very strong electrical storm, just across the road from our home, and when i downloaded it to our computer, i enhanced to picture of the cloud due to being so dark, i saw the strange lights.  (it reminded me of when in 1976 / 78 i saw two different ufo's and of in 1980 one was seen by larry mcalister over his home on broadway lake not more than 4 miles from my home.) my wife had taken the picture of the cloud due to being a "cotton-ball cloud" and no other clounds close by.

1. at home--watching storm pass in front of home
2.Noticed object when enhanced on computer
3.A disc
4. several lights in a disc shape
5.Just that the cloud was odd
6.Didn't notice it leave

 also in another picture a funny light was going either down or up in our field
content.summary: Wife took picture of strong thunderstorm, after putting on computer saw lights

content.detailedDescription:
On september 12th, 2007 i was flying from dia, denver, colorado to dallas fort worth. approximately at 9:30- am about 5 min into the flight we passed over a populated area that i think was colorado springs. i caught a flash of light and looked towards the east. what i saw was a very large round light extremely bright with smaller lights randomly moving around the larger light. the larger light flashed on and off. i watched this for several minutes. i took two digital pictures, which i am including. the camera did not pick up the very bright light but does show some interesting things. when i zoomed in on the picture i could see some very distinct white dots and some other images i could not identify. not sure if the picture will help but will enclose it for your examination. 

at the time, i could see the ground and the objects were well above the ground and the plane i was in  was much higher.  of course the time and location are just estimates. it definitely was before pueblo colorado. the pilot announced passing over pueblo some time later. thanks. 

i was in the window seat and either i was looking out towards the east or the flash caught my eye. the light seemed so bright that it was hard to look at. i was stunned to see it and i watched it til the plane moved forward and it was no longer in sight.
content.summary: Extremely bright light with lesser lights surrounding

content.detailedDescription: Ok it was morning i woke up at about 5:00 am just before light heard over the scanner that someone called and said there was a ufo over his house so then the cops went to check it out then i looked outside and was amazed at what i saw it was quite large all i saw was a bright light in the sky over to the east it looked like aboyt 30 stars all bunched up so close you could not see any seperation just bright light not to far off. did not know what to think then heard the scanner say head back to the station and get the cameras that this guy dose see something. so we took a picture of it, it turned ot looking neat but round. i grabbed my binoclars and was able to see without the glare and saw that it was long round with a purple round light in the middle of one half of it, dont know if it was front or back or what. i was feeling scared at first thought it might be something comeing towrds us from far off so we called my step sister she was on the other side of town so asked if she could see the other side of it and she said yes also saw a blue light in it and a red glow she was closer to the other side of it so i knew it was not moving just staying suspended. called the radio station and found out i was not the only one who called then heard it on radio that lots of people had called it in.When the daylight came out it was still there bright for a bit then the lighter it got outside it started to fade not move though and we waited to see if it was there the next morning but it was not. well ty. and if anyone hears anything about this one that we saw let us know please we are in crescent city, california, ty. the picture sendng does need to be zoomed..I have saved it zoomed out but will not stay zoomed when go to send it.
content.summary: It was all white except for purple light  in middle of the back or the front dont know

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work, and wanted to rest my eyes, after staring at the computer all morning.  (for some years now, i've been resting my eyes by staring out at the horizon, as suggested by a nurse at work.)  as usual, i went into a corner conference room. (i believe it was between 10 and 11 am.) from there, i can watch people outside on the streets, birds flying overhead, airplanes heading to or leaving from msp international airport, and check on the weather.

around the end of june, or beginning of july, 2007, i went into the corner conference room and began watching the people on the streets below.  it was a nice sunny morning, with big fluffy clouds floating by.

i stared towards the river and began watching planes fly overhead.  they must have redirected the planes, and i thought of our 911 disaster, as one plane headed in my direction (though clearly, it was high enough in the sky to not be a threat).  as i watched the approaching plane, it was very high in the sky, and above some clouds, but i realized it was definitely a nwa plane, since it had a red tail.  as i lowered my eyes, i saw a bird flying.

i glanced up again to see how close the plane was, when i saw it.  it was between the plane and the bird.  it was a solid black line.  in a blink, the figure went from a solid black line, to a solid black triangle, to a solid black square.  it was as though i was looking at the bottom of this object.  i think it changed form again, but i don't recall exactly what the form was.  in a blink, it kept repeating the formations.  it moved as though it was hiding at the bottom of the clouds.  the bird flew on.  the plane flew on.  the object moved slowly towards our building.

i wanted to find someone to see it with me, but i was instantly fearful of two things.  1. what would someone at work think of my asking them to come see this.  2. what would i miss if i left to go get someone.

i stared in amazement.  it went right over our building.  i thought to myself, if it is real, it will cross over to the other side of the building.  i ran to the other side of the building to look.  i stood anxiously waiting.  it appeared, and continued on, slowly, towards the capitol.  it was still continuously changing shapes.  i watched until it was gone from sight.

can anyone explain what it was that i saw?  the few family members i have told, don't believe me.  i don't dare tell anyone at work, or they'll judge me, too.  i'm wondering if anyone else out there saw what i saw.
content.summary: In a blink, it changed formation from line to triangle to square.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a warm clear night on the evening of 09/18/07 so i left the bedroom window open as i went to bed.  the blinds were raised halfway. after a few minutes, i noticed very fast flashing colored lights against my bedroom wall.  these were round lights, which flashed extremely fast, then stopped.  i watched the wall for a short time and saw nothing more so i tried to go back to sleep. after a minute or so, i looked at the wall again and saw nothing for a moment, then i saw the flashing lights flash again against the wall, then stop again.  i continued to watch the wall and after a few moments, the lights flashed again.  there were several colors: blue, yellow, red.  i thought that car headlights do not do this so i decided to get up and look out the window to try and see what was causing it.  i got up, looked out the window, and just to the southwest, there was an extremely bright light.  it was more wide than high and it looked like a row of extremely bright white lights.  i did not see any strobing lights at this point. i watched it for several seconds.  it seemed motionless and i could hear no noise -- the only noise i could hear was the water fountain in our pond in the back yard.  at first, i thought of a plane traveling straight towards me since i could see no motion.  it was low in the sky and it was above the tree line.  there was a pond, some houses and trees between the object and myself.  as i continued to observe the object, the strobing lights activated again.  these were extremely fast, bright lights that seemed to travel across the object.  i couldn't see any regular faa-regulated lights like the ones you see on the tips of wings or on the body of an aircraft.  i also have never heard of aircraft lights that were strong enough to display on the interior walls of homes.  after a few moments, the object moved to my right, which was towards the north, and the object moved behind some trees and out of my view.  i would estimate the entire visual sighting lasted about 20 to 30 seconds.  the entire episode was about 10 minutes from when i first noticed the strobing lights on the wall to the end of the visual sighting.

i have enclosed an artist rendering to communicate the location of the object from my position from the bedroom window.
content.summary: A wide extremely bright white light object with extremely fast periodic strobing lights

content.detailedDescription:
While on break from our job,about 1:30am eastern time. i and co-worker john hayes, watched as two saucer shaped disks sprang up a wooded area about two miles south of the plant, about along st rt. 334 and st rt 72 heading north along st.Rt.72 over the top of the plant at about 10,000 ft and about 4,000 mph.
 they were really moving,with aplasma sheild around the lead craft. they flew over the international harvester plant also along st. rt. 72. 
   i first noticed what looked like a fireworks mortor going off, then it started to advance towards us at extreme rate of speed, i said to john look at that pointing towards the area that it come from. he stated wtf! is that a meteor?  and i replied i don't think so meteor's don't climb in altitude,or start from the ground up. and it sure wasn't swamp gas traveling at 5,000 mph  looking at each other and saying awesome. all night long we keep shaking our heads and saying that was wild. we lost site of the objects as they passed over the building heading north, because of the extreme speed they were moving.
content.summary: Up out of wooded area along state route 334 flying over st rt 72 north

content.detailedDescription: My two friends and i are out in his backyard.  we are jumping on his trampoline when i look at tree line and see a star kind of thing in the sky but its brighter and drifting. one by one they come up from the trees.  they appear to be like orange street lights, but they're way too high to be street lights.  these three lights move in a rough line.  they appear to be bigger than stars, glowing in a weird manner, but smaller than the moon.  i'd say roughly 1/4 or 1/5 of the moon's size from where we were looking (not actually that size, but relative to it).  anyhow, two more join the first three from behind the trees and form an elongated m shape.  their motion slows down, and they are moving in various directions.  after about three or four minutes, three of them condense into a tight straight line formation, much closer than what they were like before.  after a little those three form into a triangle with the other two on the side.  eventually, the triangle slowly fades away, the one of the other two fades, and then the last one fades some time after the rest.  by the end, we were joined by my brother and father, so a total of five of us saw at least some of them.  we were positioned in a way that we were looking to the moon in the south, and the flying objects were around 45 degrees to the left of the moon.  their motion was not in the typical manner of airplanes, nor was their color and size.  no smoke trails were visible.  we captured some poor video and pictures.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange star-like drifting in formations

content.detailedDescription: Heading south bound on oh-7 i heard a fluttering sound over the sound of my stereo looked up in direction of sound saw an elongated marquise shaped flash which was moving ne toward vienna wv. saw second flash looked like it was over the wv side and it reflected on the river. after seeing this the car behind me pulled over and stopped. i felt disoriented and continued home. when i got home my girlfriend noticed the upper part of my cheeks and my nose looked sun burnt. i still feel disoriented... i called a friend and asked them if they heard any wierd sounds today and they described the sound exactly and in same time frame...
content.summary: Marquise shaped flash blue/white in color

content.detailedDescription:
while taking a break at work, in green hills pa., and watching the night sky, myself - mufon field investigator #11528 and a mufon state section director, observed a white in color, star like, anomaly moving at a very high rate of speed in comparison to the jets observed at the same moment. it moved in a sw to ne direction. the anamoly did not move in a straight, direct path, it instead appeared to move in slight serpentine motion.
  from the observation point the object covered the distance of horizon to horizon in approximately 20 seconds total, although we only noticed it when it was almost directly above us.
  when first observed the anamoly was a noticeably bright white object. the rate of speed the anamoly was moving made it immediately stand out. it then faded from view near the ne horizon. 
  no noise was heard - no physical effects felt - we felt elated
content.summary: Fastwalker observed moving sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: My father was outside in the back yard.I was in the basement.He openend the door and told me to hurry and come outside.I ran outside and he was pointing to the sky.I was amazed at what we were looking at.They were fying so smoothly heading north.I ran downstairs to the basement to get my camera.When i got back they all went into the clouds.They were white in color,most likely because the sun light was reflecting from them.They all diseappered in the clouds and the clouds were headed southeast.But we were able to see 2 of them in the clouds.They stopped and were hovering.During all this i had a huge smile on me.I always believed in ufos.After a few seconds in the clouds one ufo came down out of the cloud and was still hovering.It stayed there.Then we see a airline jet coming from north headed south towards the ufo.Then the ufo goes back in the cloud.10 seconds after the plane past the ufo comes out of the cloud and starts heading north.The others i guess have gone in another direction.Most likely south east with the clouds because we couldnt find them anymore.So the one we see is headed north and goes into a another cloud and stays there for a few minutes but we cant see it nomore because the clouds are more thick now.It appears from the clouds again and keeps going north.Now the sky is full of thick clouds.We stayed maybe 20 min looking but nothing.I go back inside.10 min my father calls me again and points to the sky to show me a airplane that has that big radar on it.It was flying around the area then it flew out of site.And 5min after that plane showed up,my father told me that 4 f-16 flew through the area.I guess they were looking for the ufos.Others had to see what we saw,thats why the f-16 were flying around with the other plane.I took 8 photos total but only 1 has the ufos in it.Maybe the others have something to but i cant find nothing.I found 2 ligths in the photo above the trees inthe clouds.You have to zoom in on the photo.I also discovered 2 more objects in the photo,1 in the left and 1 all the way on top of the photo,a total of 4 objects.Remember to zoom.Enjoy.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: There were about 8 or 10 ufos in the sky!!!

content.detailedDescription: Well lit balloon very high.
content.summary: Well lit ballooon with lit up hanging things from bottom and side.

content.detailedDescription: I didn't see the whole thing, my brother was racing outside and saw them he raced back to his room grabbed his camera and said "ufo's!" i ran outside and me, his friends, and him saw 5 dots that were very bright. they weren't like a normal airplane with two little white lights, but they had a different color. they had the color of a street lamp. the orange/yellowish lights. they  flew in and they scattered then they condensed into a a triangle. i ran inside and got my dad to come out. by the time i got back they were almost all gone. the last 2 or 3 just faded out. i think they went back into outer space. my brother got some on camera. my brother and his friends will probly have a better describtion as they got to watch more of it then me. i dont think that the pictures showed up very well so he might not post them.
content.summary: 5 ufo's that came in condensed into a triangle and then faded out.
